commit.message:
re PR c++/13701 (g++.old-deja/g++.eh/cleanup2.C ICEs)

2004-01-23  Andrew Pinski  <pinskia@physics.uc.edu>

        PR c++/13701
        * decl.c (finish_function): Move the call to
        finish_fname_decls below the call to
        finish_eh_spec_block.

From-SVN: r76464

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,10 @@
+2004-01-23  Andrew Pinski  <pinskia@physics.uc.edu>
+
+	PR c++/13701
+	* decl.c (finish_function): Move the call to
+	finish_fname_decls below the call to
+	finish_eh_spec_block.
+
